description: In nova source code, some LOG messages in  nova/virt/baremetal/virtual_power_driver.py are not wrapped with _() which will causei18n problems, we need fix this small but important issue, to make our codes professional.
title: i18n issues for nova/virt/baremetal/virtual_power_driver.py

comments.content: In nova source code, some LOG messages in  nova/virt/baremetal/virtual_power_driver.py are not wrapped with _() which will causei18n problems, we need fix this small but important issue, to make our codes professional.

commit 204d3ebec8522cfd01f260720c56e3cd879948cf
Author: Jay Lau <email address hidden>
Date:   Fri Sep 20 23:33:28 2013 +0800

    Fix i18n issue for nova/virt/baremetal/virtual_power_driver.py
    
    There are some log messages in virtual_power_driver.py does not
    support i18n, we need to update code to support it.
    
    Closes-bug: #1228449
    
    Change-Id: I6642309bd0e08e356a13d134ac0c743159af2520
